screenshots.caption: Equation definition dialog with the model browse tree

short_description: A platform for developing mathematical models of static/dynamic physical systems, a simulation evironment for such models and a set of component libraries. It combines features from Simulink, Modelica or AMESim with  unique features on its onw.
